item.title: Programmable higher-order nonequilibrium topological phases on a superconducting quantum processor
item.author: Haoran Qian
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Characterizing transport in a quantum gas by measuring Drude weights
item.author: Philipp Schüttelkopf
item.content:encoded:
Transport properties define materials as insulators, metals, or superconductors. A fundamental parameter is the Drude weight, which quantifies the ballistic transport of charge carriers. Here, we measure the Drude weights of an ultracold gas of ...
